jobDescription: Data Analyst / Engineer Data Analyst / Engineer to migrate, optimize, organize and streamline the many different data intensive initiatives. that are used to support our Research efforts. This person will also review the existing data to build efficient, automated solutions to make the current processes more efficient and design new solutions to expand the and refine the current data set. Key Skills Required / DesiredAbility to organize and manage large data setsIn-depth understanding of database structure principlesProven work experience as a Data Engineer, Data AnalystEnhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systemsMigration experience is a mustExperience in AWSProcessing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysisDoing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear mannerManage end to end data systems and processesExperience with data visualization toolsExperience with Unix Shell scriptingExperience using statistical computer languages (Python, SQL, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.Coding knowledge and experience with several languages: C, C++, Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL and related data gathering and analysis toolsprovided by Dice C, C++, Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL, AWS, UNIX Shell Scripting, Data Cleansing, Data Processing
